title: THIS IS WHY YOU WANT A SNOW PUSHER. #tractors #snowremoval #madeincanada

tasks.task: Install and use a snow removal attachment on a tractor.
subtasks: Identify the snow removal attachment as the HLA pusher.
Confirm the absence of moving parts, chutes, shear bolts, and hoses.
Verify effectiveness in various snow conditions (dry, wet, deep, dry fluffy, heavy).
Check the design feature of no cross braces to trap snow.
Note the method for propelling snow (rolled back).
Evaluate the rear drag design for moving snow away from structures.
Compare cost to alternative snow removal tools (plow, blower).

tasks.task: Purchase the HLA pusher from GoodWorksTractors.com.
subtasks: Complete the order for the pusher.
